review: Doctor is very good, he made all suggestions for better recovery, but Sai Ram hospital lab people provide waste services I ever seen, even they don't know how to do X-RAY,they took 4 to 5 X-RAYS all of them waste. I have paid Rs.400/-, it's waste.. again they referred 3M digoanstics there I have paid RS.300/- for same X-RAY..

review: Excellent.. I was forcing for doctor to permit me for x-ray.. but he just said it's  not to spend unnecessarily money.. this is what i liked him the most..

review: We are very much happy.. he is so simple and humble. Talks to patient very patiently. Prescribes ***** medicines without unnecessary tests.

****** ** ****** **** he treated my foot pain, i meet up with an accident because of that i got swelling all over my foot and pain was unbearable but doctor gave me one tablet that relive my pain with in two days great doctor i suggest him .

review: Good doctor ..talks patiently to u to understand the issue... doesnt  prescribe fancy tests...  i would definately prescribe
